Buying Guide

A good cleanser removes dirt, makeup, and excess oil without stripping your skin's natural barrier. It's the foundation of every skincare routine ‚Äî get this wrong and everything else suffers.

Quick Tips

  • üí° Double cleansing (oil cleanser + water cleanser) is the gold standard for makeup removal
  • üí° Foaming cleansers work best for oily skin; cream cleansers suit dry skin
  • üí° Your skin shouldn't feel tight after cleansing ‚Äî if it does, your cleanser is too harsh
  • üí° Micellar water is great for sensitive skin but shouldn't replace a proper cleanser
